We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer - Male

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities

	Sourcing & Negotiation: Researching and evaluating potential IT vendors, negotiating prices and terms for hardware, software, and IT services to get the best value.

	Contract Management: Developing, reviewing, and ensuring adherence to contracts to protect the company's interests.
	Budgeting: Estimating and establishing cost parameters and budgets for computer-related purchases and projects.
	Risk Management: Identifying and mitigating potential risks associated with IT supply chains, such as disruptions or compliance issues.

	Education: A Bachelor's Degree in Business, Business Management, or a related field is often required.

Lounge Supervisor Job at BhEERHUGZ




        
    

        
        BhEERHUGZ as popularly known, is a leisure and entertainment spot for urban, fun seeking people to unwind, meet and lounge. You are guaranteed a unique lounge and dining experience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Lounge Supervisor

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
Shift Leadership and Service Execution:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Shift Management: Assume responsibility for the lounge operation during shifts, delegating tasks, managing breaks, and overseeing the timely setup and breakdown of the lounge.
	Staff Supervision: Directly supervise all floor staff (waiters, runners) to ensure adherence to grooming standards, punctuality, and compliance with service sequences.
	Service Standards: Conduct pre-shift briefings and spot-checks to ensure all team members execute service at the highest level, anticipating guest needs.
	Cash Handling: Oversee shift financial reconciliation, cash management, and proper processing of POS transactions, ensuring accuracy and accountability.  


Customer Experience and Conflict Resolution:


	Guest Interaction: Actively patrol the floor, interacting with guests to gauge satisfaction and identify potential issues before they escalate.
	Complaint Handling: Resolve immediate customer complaints and disputes professionally and discreetly, escalating only complex matters to the Lounge Manager.
	Security & Safety: Monitor guest behaviour, enforce lounge security protocols (e.g., age restrictions, dress code, intoxication management), and ensure adherence to safety and hygiene regulations.
	Feedback: Ensure customer feedback surveys atre duly filled and completed after each customer's experience or dining Loyalty Program:Advise, guide and register guests on the loyalty programs  


Operational Control and Inventory Support:


	Inventory Control: Monitor the consumption and usage of bar inventory, conducting mini-stock takes during shifts, and reporting discrepancies to the Lounge Manager.
	POS and Ordering: Ensure the POS system is functioning correctly, troubleshoot basic technical issues, and ensure all orders are accurately logged and billed.
	Opening/Closing Procedures: Ensure rigorous adherence to all opening and closing checklists, including security checks, cleaning schedules, and detailed shift handovers.
	Reporting: Document and report any operational issues, maintenance needs, staff incidents, and detailed shift summaries to management.  


Others:


	Other duties as assigned by MD/Founder


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree with 2 - 3 years of work experience.


Salary

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Manager (AI Integration)",
  "description": "Omniretail is on a journey to accelerate Trade value chain stakeholders&rsquo; progress by unlocking access to services and the flow of working capital.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager (AI Integration)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Beauty

About the Role


	We are seeking a Business Development Manager to drive growth and expand our brand&rsquo;s presence globally.
	You&rsquo;ll leverage AI tools to optimize marketing, customer engagement, and business strategies, while identifying new opportunities and building strategic partnerships worldwide.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute strategies to grow the company&rsquo;s local and global presence.
	Conduct global market research and identify new opportunities and trends.
	Use AI to enhance marketing, customer targeting, and operations.
	Build and maintain relationships with international distributors and partners.
